attributes.comment:
As a friend of several parents of adoptive children, I would like to voice my
concern over the plan to raise fees for fingerprinting, 1600A and certificates
of citizenship. Many of these families must rely on adoption as the sole means
to having a family. They are wonderful people willing to open their hearts and
homes to children from foreign lands to provide a better and loving home to
children in need. The costs of adoption are already outrageous. Many loving
couples are already priced out of the possibility of affording them. It is
unconscionable that our government is adding to this incredible financial
burden. As a retired teacher I know that many families who rely on a teacher's
salary are already strapped financially. With increased fees you are increasing
the possibility that these well educated, dedicated professionals who dedicated
their lives to the children of our nation will no longer be able to have a
family of their own. Please reconsider your fee increases.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kathleen Brickell
